author: 5businesstraveler777
title: Hilton London Tower Bridge renovation
text:
If you enjoy walks along the Thames, visits to Shakespeare Globe Theatre and the several attractions in SE1, you'll like the vibrant atmosphere at this hotel. Staff were more than friendly and accommodating.
Room Tip: Business Floors are a good value--Free afternoon tea, breakfast and evening snacks See more room tips Green Features: Really robust atmosphere in common areas...located centrally in "more place" great spot to meet business associates.
